channel.title: CVE Feed for Mario Valney -- OG Tags

item.title: CVE-2021-20831|2024-08-03T17:53:22.824Z -- mario%20valney -- og%20tags
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in OG Tags versions prior to 2.0.2 allows a remote attacker to hijack the authentication of administrators and unintended operation may be performed via unspecified vectors.
